title: Miley Cyrus's Engagement Announcement: A Glimpse into Celebrity Relationships and Personal Growth
summary: Miley Cyrus, an acclaimed three-time Grammy-winning artist, has formally announced her engagement to musician Maxx Morando, her partner of four years, in an interview on Good Morning America. The revelation includes details of Morando's proposal during a trip to Asia, which Cyrus described as a surprising moment despite her controlling nature. She showcased a gold and diamond engagement ring at the Los Angeles premiere of Avatar: Fire and Ash, symbolizing their commitment. Cyrus, who was previously married to actor Liam Hemsworth from 2018 to 2019 after a decade-long relationship, met Morando via a blind date in 2023. Morando, a drummer for the LA-based band Liily, participated in Cyrus's New Year's Eve event in 2022, highlighting their professional crossover. In her statements, Cyrus emphasized Morando's role in her personal development, noting 'drastic growth' during their relationship, and discussed her latest musical contribution to the Avatar franchise. Additionally, she addressed her reluctance to tour, citing the difficulties of sustaining sobriety and mental wellness while traveling, reflecting broader conversations on artist well-being in the music industry.
